description: Captures the specified resource group as a template.

api_version.description: The API version to use for this operation.

subscription_id.description: The ID of the target subscription.

resources.description: The IDs of the resources. The only supported string currently is '*' (all resources). Future updates will support exporting specific resources.

options.description: The export template options. Supported values include 'IncludeParameterDefaultValue', 'IncludeComments' or 'IncludeParameterDefaultValue, IncludeComments

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group to export as a template.
